description: Production database server DB-PROD-03 is experiencing sustained high CPU utilization (>90%) for the past 30 minutes. This is affecting transaction processing times.
Users are reporting intermittent 503 Service Unavailable errors when accessing the customer portal. Approximately 15% of requests are failing according to monitoring.
SSL certificate for api.example.com will expire in 7 days. Renewal required to prevent service disruption.
resolution_notes: Certificate renewal in progress with vendor

short_description: Network connectivity issues between data centers
description: Intermittent packet loss detected between US-EAST and EU-WEST data centers. Latency spikes up to 300ms observed during peak hours.
resolution_notes: ISP ticket opened. Temporary routing changes implemented as workaround.

description: The authentication microservice is failing health checks. Observed 40% increase in authentication latency and occasional timeouts.
resolution_notes: Memory leak identified in version 3.4.2. Deployed hotfix to increase JVM heap size and scheduled upgrade to version 3.4.3 which contains permanent fix.

short_description: Storage capacity critical on logging server
description: Logging server LOG-STORE-02 has reached 95% disk capacity. Log retention policy may need adjustment or additional storage allocation.
resolution_notes: Implemented log rotation and compression for older logs. Added 1TB additional storage to volume. Updated monitoring thresholds.

description: Payment provider API calls timing out sporadically. Approximately 5% of payment transactions are failing with timeout errors.
resolution_notes: Initial analysis shows third-party payment processor experiencing degraded performance. Implementing circuit breaker pattern and fallback payment processor as temporary mitigation.

description: Multiple pods in the analytics cluster are being evicted due to resource constraints. This is causing job failures and delayed reporting.
Invalid content detected in CDN cache for static assets. Some users are receiving outdated or corrupted JavaScript files.
resolution_notes: Purged affected cache entries. Investigating root cause - may be related to recent deployment that didn't properly increment asset versions.

description: After recent security update, API rate limiting is triggering false positives for legitimate traffic. Multiple enterprise customers affected.
resolution_notes: Adjusted rate limiting algorithm and increased threshold for enterprise customers. Added better customer identification logic. Will monitor for 24hrs to ensure resolution.
